name: TERA: PUBG Combat Casual Pack
detailed_description:
True. Action. Combat! meets the the thrills and gear of Player Unknown's Battlegrounds! Jump into the TERA × PUBG crossover event with the right gear to get you started.

    This pack contains:
  • PUBG Combat Casual Costume
  • PUBG Pan Accessory
about_the_game:
True. Action. Combat! meets the the thrills and gear of Player Unknown's Battlegrounds! Jump into the TERA × PUBG crossover event with the right gear to get you started.

    This pack contains:
  • PUBG Combat Casual Costume
  • PUBG Pan Accessory
short_description: TERA × PUBG crossover event! This pack contains a PUBG Combat Casual costume as well as the PUBG Pan accessory.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP (32-bit only), Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8
  • Processor: AMD Athlon64 3200+ or INTEL Pentium 4 3.2ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1600T or nVidia GeForce 7600GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8 (Latest Service Packs)
  • Processor: AMD Athlon64 X2 6000+ or INTEL Core 2 Duo E6750
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 3870 or nVidia GeForce 8800GT
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 40 GB available space
